snippet.title: Batora: Lost Haven - Story Trailer - Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Batora: Lost Haven combines the features of a hack & slash and a twin-stick shooter in a nonlinear interplanetary story-driven action RPG. Coming to Nintendo Switch in 2022.

Learn more about Avril's adventures across the planets in the brand new story trailer for Batora: Lost Haven.

#Batora #IndieWorld #NintendoSwitch

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot
